1.brief: David, the youngest son of Jesse
properly, instrumental music; by implication, a poem set to notes
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
the earth (as moist and therefore inhabited); by extension, the globe; by implication, its inhabitants; specifically, a particular land, as Babylonia, Palestine
properly, to sit down (specifically as judge. in ambush, in quiet); by implication, to dwell, to remain; causatively, to settle, to marry

2.brief: (by implication) very widely used as a relative conjunction or adverb (as below); often largely modified by other particles annexed

he (she or it); only expressed when emphatic or without a verb; also (intensively) self, or (especially with the article) the same; sometimes (as demonstrative) this or that; occasionally (instead of copula) as or are
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications

a sea (as breaking in noisy surf) or large body of water; specifically (with the article), the Mediterranean Sea; sometimes a large river, or an artifical basin; locally, the west, or (rarely) the south
to set (literally or figuratively); intensively, to found; reflexively, to sit down together, i.e. settle, consult
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
a stream (including the sea; expectation the Nile, Euphrates, etc.); figuratively, prosperity

properly, to be erect (i.e. stand perpendicular); hence (causatively) to set up, in a great variety of applications, whether literal (establish, fix, prepare, apply), or figurative (appoint, render sure, proper or prosperous)

3.brief: who? (occasionally, by a peculiar idiom, of things); also (indefinitely) whoever; often used in oblique construction with prefix or suffix
to ascend, intransitively (be high) or actively (mount); used in a great variety of senses, primary and secondary, literal and figurative
a mountain or range of hills (sometimes used figuratively)
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
who? (occasionally, by a peculiar idiom, of things); also (indefinitely) whoever; often used in oblique construction with prefix or suffix
to rise (in various applications, literal, figurative, intensive and causative)
properly, a standing, i.e. a spot; but used widely of a locality (general or specific); also (figuratively) of a condition (of body or mind)
a sacred place or thing; rarely abstract, sanctity

4.brief: the hollow hand or palm (so of the paw of an animal, of the sole, and even of the bowl of a dish or sling, the handle of a bolt, the leaves of a palm-tree); figuratively, power
the heart (as the most interior organ);
who, which, what, that; also (as an adverb and a conjunction) when, where, how, because, in order that, etc.
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
to lift, in a great variety of applications, literal and figurative, absolute and relative
evil (as destructive), literally (ruin) or morally (especially guile); figuratively idolatry (as false, subjective), uselessness (as deceptive, objective; also adverbially, in vain)
properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
not (the simple or abs. negation); by implication, no; often used with other particles
to seven oneself, i.e. swear (as if by repeating a declaration seven times)

5.brief: to lift, in a great variety of applications, literal and figurative, absolute and relative
properly, self (but generally used to point out more definitely the object of a verb or preposition, even or namely)
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
rightness (abstractly), subjectively (rectitude), objectively (justice), morally (virtue) or figuratively (prosperity)

gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative

6.brief: the masculine demonstrative pronoun, this or that
properly, a revolution of time, i.e. an age or generation; also a dwelling
properly, to tread or frequent; usually to follow (for pursuit or search); by implication, to seek or ask; specifically to worship
to search out (by any method, specifically in worship or prayer); by implication, to strive after
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)

7.brief: to lift, in a great variety of applications, literal and figurative, absolute and relative
an opening, i.e. door or gate
the head (as most easily shaken), whether literal or figurative (in many applications, of place, time, rank, itc.)
to lift, in a great variety of applications, literal and figurative, absolute and relative
an opening (literally), i.e. door (gate) or entrance way
properly, concealed, i.e. the vanishing point; generally, time out of mind (past or future), i.e. (practically) eternity; frequentatively, adverbial (especially with prepositional prefix) always
to go or come (in a wide variety of applications)
properly, weight, but only figuratively in a good sense, splendor or copiousness

the masculine demonstrative pronoun, this or that

Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
forcible; collectively and concretely, an army
